metadata.title: USN-5387-1 -- Barbican vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Douglas Mendiz√°bal discovered that Barbican incorrectly handled access restrictions. An authenticated attacker could possibly use this issue to consume protected resources and possibly cause a denial of service. (CVE-2022-23451, CVE-2022-23452)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5387-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  barbican-keystone-listener - 1:10.1.0-0ubuntu2.1 barbican-api - 1:10.1.0-0ubuntu2.1 barbican-worker - 1:10.1.0-0ubuntu2.1 barbican-common - 1:10.1.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-barbican - 1:10.1.0-0ubuntu2.1 barbican-doc - 1:10.1.0-0ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
